Dear Mr. Hagop

 

Please find the attached documents for the remaining 2% against the below addition request.

 

Inception date: 11/07/2025 till expiry period of the fleet of EVLAB 10/05/2026 = 304 days.

AGREED TERMS: AED. 150,000 *6% = AED. 9000 +270 (PAB)= AED. 9270/365*304 = AED. 7721+25= AED. 7746/- (exclusive VAT)

EVLAB fleet (34DN00618943) : AED. 150,000 *4% = AED. 6000 +270 (PAB)= AED. 6,270/365*304 = AED. 5,222+25= AED. 5,247/- (exclusive VAT)

REAL EMIRATES FLEET (34DN00636911) : AED. 7746 -5247 = AED. 2,499/- (exclusive VAT)

 

 

Best Regards,

 

Mridul Nambiar M.B.A CII (AWARD) 

Assistant Manager - Motor
